comments:
When infocenter is exposed to the user as different URL than host:port/help, 
for example host:port/help21, by using proxy, topic synchronization does not 
work.

Created an attachment (id=4551)
patch.txt

A patch.

This problem does not affect Eclipse workbench, but is a major issue for 
infocenter users.  The problem should be fixed in 2.1.1.

Created an attachment (id=4552)
eclipse\plugins\org.eclipse.help.webapp_2.1.0\WEB-INF\lib\jsp.jar

Attached a compiled patch - jsp.jar file to replace
eclipse\plugins\org.eclipse.help.webapp_2.1.0\WEB-INF\lib\jsp.jar shipped with
Eclipse 2.1

Here are the errors messages that result when I try the new jsp.jar

Sorry.  The jars are somehow corrupted when attaching and detaching them to or 
from bug report.

Instead, please take jsp.jar.zip from attachement in comment 7, and unzip to 
eclipse\plugins\org.eclipse.help.webapp_2.1.0\WEB-INF\lib
Okay, the new file has been implemented on dev.eclipse.org.
I have tried, and synchronization works now.
